lead_paragraph: England manager Roy Hodgson has defended his strategy of deploying strikers Jamie Vardy and Harry Kane in wide areas during the 1-0 win over 10-man Portugal in a Euro 2016 warm-up at Wembley on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Hodgson Defends Tactics During England Win Over Portugal
headline.main: Hodgson Defends Tactics During England Win Over Portugal

snippet: England manager Roy Hodgson has defended his strategy of deploying strikers Jamie Vardy and Harry Kane in wide areas during the 1-0 win over 10-man Portugal in a Euro 2016 warm-up at Wembley on Thursday....
